content.chorus:
Enwere m anuri age m nuru ka ha n 'ekwu si
K'anyi fee n 'ulo Chukwu, n 'ulo Chineke Nna muo
N'ulo Chukwu.
verses:
Enwere m anuri oge m nuru ka ha n'ekwu
K'anyi jee nu n'ulo Chukwu uuu
Ngi bu Jerusalem anyi kwuzi
N'onu uzo ama gi.

Ewuru Jerusalem, dika oke obodo kwusiri ike
dika oke obodo kwusiri Ike
Ebe ahu ka Mba nile na aga
Mba nile nke Dinwenu.
content.refrain: K'anyi jee n'ulo Chukwu, n'ulo Chukwu     2x
refrain_verses: Na ndi enyi m ana m ekwu si (Ref.)
N'hi ihunanya mnwere maka ulo nke Dinwenu(Ref.)
Aga m ario maka odi mma gi (Ref. Chorus)
